appDescription.message: Force localStorage.theme to 'dark' when enabled and 'custom-winter' when disabled, with a popup toggle.

popupHint.message:
Enabled: sets localStorage.theme = dark
Disabled: sets to custom-winter

modalBodyOn.message:
Theme set to dark.
To apply correctly, close this tab and open the site in a new tab.

modalBodyOff.message:
Theme reverted to the default.
To apply correctly, close this tab and open the site in a new tab.
